text: Ɛhɔ na ɔsɔfo Sadok faa ngotoa1.39 Ngo a wɔbɔ din wɔ ha yi yɛ ngo a wɔbɔɔ din wɔ Ɛksodɔs mu (2 Mose 30.22-33) no. fii ntamadan1.39 Ntamadan no yɛ ntamadan a Dawid yɛ maa Apam Adaka no. Nhyiamu Ntamadan a wosii no nweatam so no da so wɔ Gibeon (3.4; 2 Sam 6.17). kronkron mu hɔ behwie guu Salomo tirim. Afei, wɔhyɛn torobɛnto maa nnipa no nyinaa teɛteɛɛ mu se, “Ɔhene Salomo nkwa so!”
